snippet.title: CAREER MODE IS OUT NOW! | Ballistic Baseball
snippet.description:
New Career Mode!
- Start in Semi-pro League
- Earn training points 
- Train your team your way
- Manage your team
- Make your way to the Big Leagues!

Update to version 1.0.9 is here, download now on Apple Arcade! https://apple.co/-Ballistic 
- New Emotes in PvP games!
- This Update is required in order to play opponents online
- More bug fixes, tuning, improvements & animations

Full Patch Notes are available in the notes tab.
https://www.facebook.com/notes/ballistic-baseball/ballistic-baseball-patch-notes-december-2019/148476239839187/?__tn__=HH-R
